issue.title: Redundant creation of RtJson objects in json() and patch() methods

repository.name: jcabi-github

body: @yegor256 sure! @carlosmiranda thanks for reporting, 15 mins was added to your account (trn ID: `DA2140563`)
@longtimeago this ticket is yours now, please proceed, and keep in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/intro). Any technical questions you should ask right here

@longtimeago **30 mins** is the budget of the task. This is exactly how much will be paid when the problem is solved (no matter how much time you will actually spend). See [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) for more information
@carlosmiranda Please, close the issue. Thank you!
@longtimeago Much obliged! I've added **30 mins** to your account in payment "DA2152398"
